titleStmt.title: A monstrous shape. Or a shapelesse monster A description of a female creature borne in Holland, compleat in every p[arte] save only a head like a swine, who hath travailed into many parts, and is now to be seene in London, ... To the tune of the Spanish Pavin.
titleStmt.author: L.P. (Lawrence Price), fl. 1625-1680?.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F[lesher] for Tho: Lambert, and are to be sold at the signe of the Horse shooe in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Both parts have woodcut illustrations at head.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Horse shooe in Smithfield
